project_descr: The purpose of the Project Preparation Grant PPG- is to develop a  GEF Full Sized Project FSP- (above US$ 1 million) proposal of a Project Identification Form PIF- that has been submitted and approved by the GEF. The PIF stated that the project to be

outputs.output_descr:
The purpose of the Project Preparation Grant PPG- is to develop a  GEF Full Sized Project FSP- (above US$ 1 million) proposal of a Project Identification Form PIF- that has been submitted and approved by the GEF. The PIF stated that the project to be developed will aim to "Promote ecotourism to strengthen the sustainability of Guatemala's National System of Protected Areas (SIGAP)" by increasing revenues, reducing costs, and improving financial planning and management at the level of the entire system and some of its constituent Protected Area units. 

This preparatory phase aims at finalizing the studies and arrangements for the submission of this FSP project to the GEF. The PPG will also enable the stakeholders' consultations and data collection for the establishment of baseline and complementary activities that will be validated by involved stakeholders.  The following text form the approved PPG outline the activities, costs and expertise that will be provided through this IP.

The final product of this Initiation Plan or IP and PPG is thus, a final FSP Project Document, according to GEF's requirements and with active participation of all relevant stakeholders.  This Project Document will include a contextual analysis of the legal and policy framework, biodiversity baseline, financial gaps, and capacity needs, that will enable the promotion of ecotourism as a strategy to strengthen the sustainability of the Guatemalan Protected Areas System (SIGAP).

project_title: promote ecotourism in protected area system
